item.title: CasperJS/PhantomJS - Tutorial
item.description: We use PhantomJS - This acts as browser to run test in. CasperJS - build for PhantomJS, this give you some nice utilities for testing such as clicks and logging events. Steps 1 - Install Node.js and NPM $ brew install node Steps 2 - Install PhantomJS $ npm install phantomjs -g To test that PhantomJS has installed and is accessible through your terminal: phantomjs -v This will return version of phantomjs Write your first PhantomJS hello world script.
